local_schema.short_desc: Close the control-center when a task is activated
local_schema.longdesc: if true, the control-center will close when a "Common Task" is activated.

local_schema.short_desc: Exit shell on upgrade or uninstall action performed
local_schema.longdesc: Indicates whether to close the shell when an upgrade or uninstall action is performed.

local_schema.short_desc: Exit shell on start action performed
local_schema.longdesc: Indicates whether to close the shell when a start action is performed.

local_schema.short_desc: Exit shell on help action performed
local_schema.longdesc: Indicates whether to close the shell when a help action is performed.

local_schema.short_desc: Exit shell on add or remove action performed
local_schema.longdesc: Indicates whether to close the shell when an add or remove action is performed.
The task name to be displayed in the control-center followed by a ";" separator then the filename of an associated .desktop file to launch for that task.
